fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each day, target a player; you learn there role. You can then decide if you want to publicly reveal it, and if you do, it will be displayed that the genius has revealed X.
- Each night, attempt to construct a drone; each drone will have a random effect that will be determined by the host.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Everybody knows you are in play.
- Drones cannot hurt towns win condition. IE: If a drone targets an evil player they may kill them, but if it targets a good player they may not.
- If you get hanged, town loses.
- You are considered to be visiting everybody at once every night, however you do not trigger any on visit effects. (IE: Counted for Post 2925, but not LO.)
- If you were to die, your clone takes over.(2 lives)
- You are conversion immune.
**- This role was made by Luka who had Asew, the Infinite One (2020) in Subgame 3. The misspelling in the name stays.**
